<ng-input>

Text Input Effects from Codrops for Angular directives

fork ng-input on github

Install

Install using bower

$ bower install ng-input

Install using npm

$ npm install ng-input

Usage

Inject the ngInput module

angular.module('app', ['ngInput']);
<ng-input theme='haruki' label='First Name' ng-model='first_name'></ng-input>

Themes

Codrops Themes

check article at Codrops

Haruki



{{ first_name }} {{ last_name }}
{{ email }}
